DOC.brief_summary: This study is planning to develop the audiovisual videos and determine whether educational videos are superior to routine discussion for informing trauma patients in emergency department (ED) about risks, benefits, and alternatives to receiving surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Improving Informed Consent Process for Trauma Patients in the Emergency Department
DOC.criteria: 18 years of age or older scheduled to receive the surgery clinically unstable refuse to participate unable to understand the consent process for this study
